page.title: 11ALLOTMENT GARDENS
page.content: The allotments near Longworth road and Beaumont Ave. were started by 12 men who used to rent other land on the other side of Horwich.When the landlord evicted them because he needed the land for building purposes, they all got together and pooled their money to buy one and a quarter acres from the Bleachers Association who owned the land near Longworth Rd. The land cost 100 pounds and the men divided it into allotments for themselves and to rent to other people im Horwich.These allotments are in great demand today and provide a source of great pleasure for the people who rent and cultivate them.
